imageParams.style: <style>Matrix and Ghost in the Shell style</style>

beats.imagePrompt: A lone coder walking through a neon-lit alley, holographic code floating around, cyberpunk atmosphere
beats.moviePrompt: Camera slowly pans behind the walking coder as holograms flicker and code pulses through the air

beats.imagePrompt: Close-up of cyberpunk sunglasses reflecting scrolling green code, matrix aesthetic
beats.moviePrompt: Reflection in the glasses animates with scrolling matrix-style code while the camera slowly zooms in

beats.imagePrompt: Liquid metal hand reaching toward a glowing holographic terminal, dark background
beats.moviePrompt: The hand stretches and ripples like mercury, reaching for a swirling, responsive hologram

beats.imagePrompt: Futuristic city skyline at night with translucent AI faces hovering in the clouds
beats.moviePrompt: Clouds shift gently as AI faces form and dissolve while lights flicker across the cityscape

beats.imagePrompt: Neural network glowing like tree roots inside a transparent human skull
beats.moviePrompt: Light pulses through the neural branches in rhythm with a slow electronic heartbeat

beats.imagePrompt: Human silhouette surrounded by spinning AI-generated schematics and neon wires
beats.moviePrompt: Schematics rotate and evolve in 3D space while the silhouette tilts its head slightly

beats.imagePrompt: Hooded figure dissolving into vertical lines of green matrix-style code
beats.moviePrompt: The figure flickers and then disintegrates into streaming green code, blown by digital wind

beats.imagePrompt: Humanoid robots with mechanical arms typing on invisible floating keyboards
beats.moviePrompt: Fingers type rapidly as translucent UI elements flash and shift in sync with rhythm

beats.imagePrompt: Digital rain of matrix code falling over a sleek chrome laptop
beats.moviePrompt: Code rain flows in slow motion while the laptop screen flickers and glows with AI symbols

beats.imagePrompt: Cybernetic brain with glowing veins connected to a data stream, black void backdrop
beats.moviePrompt: Data pulses travel through the brain’s glowing veins, illuminating its inner structure

beats.imagePrompt: Futuristic workspace with floating translucent terminal windows around a focused coder
beats.moviePrompt: The terminals orbit slowly, displaying evolving code as the coder calmly types in AR space

beats.imagePrompt: Massive glowing AI core pulsing like a heartbeat in a dark techno-temple
beats.moviePrompt: The AI core pulses rhythmically with lighting flares and brief electric arcs

beats.imagePrompt: Bioluminescent jellyfish flying over a neon-drenched futuristic megacity
beats.moviePrompt: The jellyfish float and undulate smoothly through the skyline while city lights ripple below

beats.imagePrompt: Cyberpunk girl with wires plugged into her neck, syncing to cloud server
beats.moviePrompt: Her eyes flicker with data as wires glow and the background turns into streaming data flow

beats.imagePrompt: Glitched digital mirror showing a distorted virtual doppelgänger
beats.moviePrompt: The doppelgänger twitches with glitch effects as the mirror bends and distorts reality

beats.imagePrompt: Replit terminal interface projected as a glowing 3D object in midair
beats.moviePrompt: The terminal rotates slowly in space while snippets of animated code run inside it

beats.imagePrompt: Swarm of AI agents constructing a virtual building in real-time, wireframe style
beats.moviePrompt: Agents hover and place glowing pieces of architecture, forming a wireframe skyscraper

beats.imagePrompt: Code water dripping like raindrops into an open laptop with green glow
beats.moviePrompt: Each drop distorts reality as it hits the screen, causing data ripples to expand outward

beats.imagePrompt: Ghostly avatars dancing around a central holographic bonfire in the dark
beats.moviePrompt: The avatars loop in synchronized movement as the bonfire crackles with glowing fractals

beats.imagePrompt: Floating AI eyes scanning a human face for data, surrounded by code symbols
beats.moviePrompt: Eyes shift and blink in sequence as data overlays animate across the human’s face

beats.imagePrompt: Robotic hand and human hand shaking over a glowing schematic
beats.moviePrompt: The handshake animates with sparks and pulses flowing between the hands

beats.imagePrompt: Interior of Codex cathedral — code flowing like stained glass light
beats.moviePrompt: Camera glides through the cathedral as the stained glass pulses with flowing syntax

beats.imagePrompt: Drone swarm forming a neural node in the sky over a nighttime city
beats.moviePrompt: Drones swarm into a glowing node pattern, flashing in a rhythm like neural spikes

beats.imagePrompt: Abstract data waterfalls cascading from a glowing cliff into cyberspace
beats.moviePrompt: The waterfall streams down smoothly, revealing faint characters in the flow

beats.imagePrompt: Cursor IDE shining like a sacred artifact in a server chamber
beats.moviePrompt: Camera slowly circles the Cursor IDE as its interface projects light and spins

beats.imagePrompt: Fractal music waveform forming from code in midair, pulsing with beats
beats.moviePrompt: The waveform ripples and bursts outward with each bass hit, fractals growing outward

beats.imagePrompt: Human and AI staring at each other across a wireframe bridge of light
beats.moviePrompt: Bridge pulses as the camera slowly zooms toward the meeting point of the two figures

beats.imagePrompt: Dark monolith screen displaying 'NO BUGS DETECTED' in matrix code
beats.moviePrompt: Letters blink into place one by one as green light glows softly from the monolith

beats.imagePrompt: Masked hacker group in LED masks bobbing to music in a glowing alley
beats.moviePrompt: The group moves to the beat as the LEDs flicker and animate with rhythmic color pulses

beats.imagePrompt: Time-lapse of digital code turning into a physical futuristic city
beats.moviePrompt: Code builds layer-by-layer into a solid cityscape as buildings rise from data streams

beats.imagePrompt: AI-controlled holographic model city being manipulated by robotic arms
beats.moviePrompt: Robotic arms adjust and reshape glowing buildings with smooth precision

beats.imagePrompt: Futuristic DJ deck with data streams replacing vinyl, holograms spinning
beats.moviePrompt: The DJ moves hands across air-turntables, making code and beats flash in sync

beats.imagePrompt: Code particles assembling into a living cybernetic creature mid-air
beats.moviePrompt: The creature forms piece by piece as code particles spin and magnetize into place

beats.imagePrompt: Twilight over a networked world — cables hanging like vines across buildings
beats.moviePrompt: Cables sway gently in the digital breeze as network nodes glow like fireflies

beats.imagePrompt: Final title 'VIBE THE CODE' emerging from matrix rain, glowing in green
beats.moviePrompt: Matrix rain parts as the title emerges in bold, flickering neon text

beats.imagePrompt: Black screen with faint waveform pulse fading into silence
beats.moviePrompt: Waveform slowly fades into a single point of light, then vanishes
